name: Towelket: One More Time 5 ~ Fury ~
description:
Towelket: One More Time - Fury (タオルケットをもう一度５「クラシック」), or called; Towelket: Once Again ~ Fury ~ is a story-heavy adventure/role-playing game made in RPG MAKER 2000.

As soon as the main character was born, he was caught up in a terrible fate. And then on the constellation Day, it came to fruition. The result of a twisted love triangle... (Note: Fury contains game-breaking bugs, and, perhaps due to its disturbing content, was removed from public download some time after its release. "Gaugau's Bride" was released as the fifth installment later on, despite being a completely different game).
